name: piefed
description: PyFedi is a Python-based self-hosted federated server framework that integrates ActivityPub capabilities for building social applications.
features: ActivityPub protocol: Federate with other ActivityPub-compatible platforms like Mastodon and Lemmy.
Community creation: Create and moderate communities for topic-based discussions and content sharing.
Post aggregation: Aggregate posts from federated instances into a unified feed.
Voting system: Upvote and downvote posts and comments to surface quality content.
Moderation tools: Manage communities with tools for removing content, banning users, and setting rules.
User profiles: Customize profiles with bios, avatars, and activity history.
Cross-instance interaction: Comment, vote, and interact with content from other federated servers.
Privacy controls: Configure post visibility and control who can see and interact with your content.
Markdown support: Format posts and comments with Markdown for rich text formatting.
Notification system: Receive alerts for replies, mentions, and community activity.
Search functionality: Find posts, comments, and communities across federated instances.
Custom themes: Personalize the interface appearance with theme options and customization.
